text.tspan: Pupils per qualified teacher in primary education vs. GDP per
A qualified teacher is one who has the minimum academic qualifications necessary to teach at a primary level of education in a
Pupils per qualified teacher in primary education
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics via World Bank (2023)
Note: GDP per capita data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
